Package com.ibm.di.UpdateInstaller

Provides classes for the Tivoli Directory Integrator installer.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AMCInstalledComponent Represents an AMC component.
ASCIIFileUpdate Allows modification of ASCII files.
CheckForJREUpdate Allows wrapper scripts to see if the JRE is being updated by a fix or rolled back.
CheckForUpdateInstallerUpdate Allows wrapper scripts to see if the Update Installer is being updated by a fix or rolled back.
EnrollLUMLicense EnrollLUMLicense is the class that handles enrolling a LUM license.
FileGarbageCan Represents files that need to be deleted after a program completes.
Fix Represents a single fix.
FixUtils A variety of utilities and constants available for use throughout the update installer.
GetStreamOutput Used to siphon off the standard and error output of commands executed from a Java program.
InstalledComponent Represents an installed component in TDI.
LWIInstalledComponent Represents an LWI (Embedded Web Platform) component.
Registry Represents the current TDI installation including installed components and fixes that have been applied.
ReplaceUpdateInstallerJar Allows wrapper scripts to replace UpdateInstaller.jar if the Update Installer is being updated by a fix
Unzip Provides several static utilities for use when unzipping files from an archive.
UpdateInstaller UpdateInstaller is the class that handles applying TDI fixes.
UpdateInstallerMsgs Implements the messaging and logging functions required by the update installer
 

Package com.ibm.di.UpdateInstaller Description

Provides classes for the Tivoli Directory Integrator installer.
